body_html: @aswin1980 Check out the "CIFAR10_Part1" and "CIFAR10_Part2" tutorials in the caffe2/tutorials repo. Part 1 specifically shows how to take a custom image dataset (in this case .png mirror of the CIFAR-10 dataset), format it, create image LMDBs, and train a model on them.
body_text: @aswin1980 Check out the "CIFAR10_Part1" and "CIFAR10_Part2" tutorials in the caffe2/tutorials repo. Part 1 specifically shows how to take a custom image dataset (in this case .png mirror of the CIFAR-10 dataset), format it, create image LMDBs, and train a model on them.
body: @aswin1980 Check out the "CIFAR10_Part1" and "CIFAR10_Part2" tutorials in the [caffe2/tutorials](https://github.com/caffe2/tutorials/) repo. Part 1 specifically shows how to take a custom image dataset (in this case .png mirror of the CIFAR-10 dataset), format it, create image LMDBs, and train a model on them.
